# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is a workshop on open data.  
  
If you like the workshop and want to keep it forever, make it yours. You can 

1. fork [the github repo]() this Quarto book is based on
2. go to settings of you new repo and go to "pages". Then set ... to "gh-pages"
3. set the description of your repo to ...
4. open your new webpage by clicking on ...
